content.html: You can tell it's getting tight out here, even for tech people. When hardcore open source people have to get salaried jobs. No offense to anyone involved here. I'm not judging anybody. I just wanna call out that these things are almost always driven by economics.
content.value:
You can tell it's getting tight out here, even for tech people. When hardcore open source people have to get salaried jobs.

No offense to anyone involved here. I'm not judging anybody. I just wanna call out that these things are almost always driven by economics.
